welcome_and_enter_number: Welcome to Persia Tickets. Please enter your phone number. We’ll text you to confirm your number.
please_enter_valid_email_msg: Please enter a valid email address
verification_sent_email: We sent a verification code to your email address. Please enter it.
confirm_rules_to_finish_account_setup: Confirm rules to finish account setup.
you_must_read_and_agree_to_the_following: To create a user account, you must read and agree to the following terms and conditions:
your_account_has_been_successfully_creat: Your account has been successfully created.
select_notification_message: Please select the ways you would like to receive the latest changes to the event you have booked or important messages.
provide_your_name_and_password_to_contin: Provide your name and password to continue.
ticket_purchase_term_description: All ticket sales are final. After purchase, you can change your seat or position for a few minutes, after which tickets are non-refundable or exchangeable, unless the event is canceled or rescheduled.
event_changes_term_description: We reserve the right to make changes to events, including date, time, venue and order. We will notify users of any material changes via email or via the Platform.
account_term_description: Users must create an account to purchase tickets. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and all activities that occur under your account.
age_restrictions_term_description: Some events may have age restrictions. It is the user's responsibility to ensure that they meet the age requirements of the event.
code_of_conduct_term_description: Users must adhere to all rules and regulations set forth by the event organizers and venue. Disruptive behavior may result in expulsion from the event without a refund.
data_privacy_term_description: We respect your privacy. Personal data collected during the registration and purchase process will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
limitation_of_liability_term_description: We are not responsible for any indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of the Services or attendance at the Events.
governing_law_term_description: These terms are governed by the laws of Austria and Germany. Any dispute will be settled in the relevant courts of the respective country.
we_sent_a_verification_code_to_[placehol: We sent a verification code to [placeholder]
log_in_with_an_one_time_code: Log in with an one-time code
forgot_password_check_email_again_part_1: Please check again. If you still haven’t received an email, try a
password_reset_success_message: Your password has been successfully reset. Click below to log in magically.
your_new_password_must_be_different_with: Your new password must be different to previously used passwords.
provide_email_to_receive_reset_instructi: Provide email to receive reset instructions.
click_the_link_in_your_email_with_period: Click the link in your email.
we_will_send_you_instructions_to_reset_y: We will send you instructions to reset your password.
password_do_not_match_message: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
exclusive_iranian_access: Exclusive Access to Iranian Concerts Worldwide
no_events_found_message: Oops! Looks like there are no events at this time. Check back soon for more updates!
